OOP Card Deck

(manager) => { return `

${manager.getName()}

${manager.getRole()}

  • ID: ${manager.getId()}
  • E-mail: ${manager.getEmail()}
  • Office Number: ${manager.getOfficeNum()}
` }
(engineer) => { return `

${engineer.getName()}

${engineer.getRole()}

  • ID: ${engineer.getId()}
  • E-mail: ${engineer.getEmail()}
  • GitHub: ${engineer.getGitHub()}
` }
(intern) => { return `

${intern.getName()}

${intern.getRole()}

  • ID: 1
  • E-mail: ${intern.getEmail()}
  • School: ${intern.getSchool()}
` }
